argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invlmhm.b | |- I = ( invg ` M ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` M ) = ( Base ` M ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` M ) = ( .s ` M ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` M ) = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_id | |- ( M e. LMod -> M e. LMod ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( M e. LMod -> ( Scalar ` M ) = ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_lmodabl | |- ( M e. LMod -> M e. Abel ) |
| 9 | 2, 1 | #P_invghm | |- ( M e. Abel <-> I e. ( M GrpHom M ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylib | |- ( M e. LMod -> I e. ( M GrpHom M ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 4, 3, 1, 5 | #P_lmodvsinv2 | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` M ) ) -> ( x ( .s ` M ) ( I ` y ) ) = ( I ` ( x ( .s ` M ) y ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` M ) ) -> ( I ` ( x ( .s ` M ) y ) ) = ( x ( .s ` M ) ( I ` y ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` M ) ) ) -> ( I ` ( x ( .s ` M ) y ) ) = ( x ( .s ` M ) ( I ` y ) ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 3, 3, 4, 4, 5, 6, 6, 7, 10, 13 | #P_islmhmd | |- ( M e. LMod -> I e. ( M LMHom M ) ) |
